ygData.subject: Mould Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah, such a BIG offer.  Pls loot a JBoot for ya humble friend Ziltus will do, hehe. Nowadays it s VERY difficult to camp for item.  A SBS may take u up to 3
ygData.messageBody:
Wah, such a BIG offer. Pls loot a JBoot for ya humble friend Ziltus will
do, hehe.

Nowadays it's VERY difficult to camp for item. A SBS may take u up to 3
hrs. A dirk 5 hrs. A BoB 8 hrs.

KNN I spend 3 days doing the SM quest.

Now I got a blade mould and a sledge mould from the smith (another quest
with the dwarven smith when I do the SM quest). Anyone know wat to do with
it?

On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 1:39 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> ah... forget the previous mail i sent... hehe... didnt read this one b4 i
> send out the last... then i supose i dont need to spend all day nuking
> myself... just concentrate on leveling... and im gonna hit 30... then im
> gonna hit 35... then im gonna get everyone a fucking FBR fer free!
>
> Nic
> p/s : in the guild only hor!
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Ebon Praetor <kelc@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Something bout Specialization.
> boundary="----=_NextPart_001_0040_01BEE8B6.BCC26160"
>
>
> > From: "Ebon Praetor" <kelc@...>
> >
> > > When one of them hit 51, the rest of them will not increase anymore?
> > i believe ziltus ask this question b4... but since i have one of them
> > in the 40s, i should know bout it and start working on something,
> > otherwise the rest will not increase anymore... so ziltus dont tell
> > me u just spend one bloody day do nothing but just keep casting
> > spells?
> >
> > When one specialisation hits 51, the rest will not increase
> > BEYOND 50. They will still increase if below 50, but will cap out at
> > 50.
> >
> > The one that hits 51 first will go on to your level cap.
> >
> >
> > --
